    • Method Detail

      • getGame

        public Game getGame()

      • dealCards

        public void dealCards()
        This function deals cards to the players in the beginning of the match.

      • handleCard

        public void handleCard​(TransmitData data)

        This function handles cards and sent by the users. It checks wether or not the user has pressed uno, if the user wants to draw a card from the deck, if the user draws 3 cards we will move on to the next player. Otherwise the card is handled and all effects of the placed card are evaluated and added to the game state

        Parameters:
        data - contains data regarding cards and players

      • WeHaveAWinner

        public boolean WeHaveAWinner()
        deciding if round is won decision is made by cecking the size of a players handdeck at the end of their turn
        Returns:
        true if round is wo by current player else false

      • run

        public void run()
        The main loop of the server program. Waits for users to connect ands starts a new thread for each connected client
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
